item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Musk threatens fed workers over return to office policy
item.description: Federal workers are getting widely mixed messaging regarding who to listen to: Elon Musk or their federal managers.

item.title: WATCH: A-Rod sinks half-court shot, winning student $10,000
item.description: Former baseball superstar Alex Rodriguez nailed the shot at a Bucknell University basketball game, and the payday went to a lucky student.

item.title: Federal workers sue over Musk's threat to fire if they don't explain accomplishments
item.description: Attorneys for federal workers say in a lawsuit billionaire Trump adviser Elon Musk violated the law with his weekend demand that employees explain the...

item.title: After clashes with AG's top aide, a White House liaison is reassigned: Sources
item.description: Efforts by a White House intermediary to push the DOJ to hire candidates with "exceptional loyalty" to Trump sparked clashes with AG Pam Bondi's top a...

item.title: WATCH: Rescued baby seal settles in at Connecticut aquarium
item.description: Chappy the seal is around 6 weeks old and has a new home at the Mystic Aquarium.
